name: Sudden Strike 2 Gold
description: At the height of World War 2, take command of German, Russian, British, American and Imperial Japanese armies on battelfields across the globe. Sudden Strike 2 expands on all aspects of the classic RTS game with new units, maps and epic campaigns as well as overhauled multiplayer modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP 32-bit Processor: Intel or AMD 2Ghz Dual-Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c hardware compatible, 256 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
